column5: Just returned from three great days of service and fishing at Silver Water Wheel. This was our second trip there and I just wanted to say thanks to Mike and all his staff. We take several of our customers on this trip and we of course want it to be a trip that they enjoy and one that will enhance our relationship with each customer. SWWL is a great host and they not only put us all on fish they feed us like Kings. Thanks Again SWWL

I visited Silver Water Wheel web site last night and read their detailed fishing reports- week by week stats as well as where the bite is and what presentation was working -impressive and helpful. Great web site, also looks like a great camp.
